subject: Remove properties in junit xml file before generating xml file using ant
msgSnippet: I m able to generate junit xml file, but it contains all the system properties like passwords, ssh keys etc.so need to stop including properties into xml
messageBody: I'm able to generate junit xml file, but it contains all the system properties like passwords, ssh keys etc.so need to stop including properties into xml output. I know we can modify the xml output and remove the properties, But I don't know the output file location(If I apply it in a generic way to remove in all the .xml files then it is not appropriate). Please suggest is it feasible?
